verbs.description: [ARG1: The release of the detainees] [V: came] [ARGM-TMP: as Pompeo visited North Korea on Wednesday to finalize plans for a historic summit between Trump and the North 's leader , Kim Jong Un] .

The release of the detainees came as [ARG0: Pompeo] [V: visited] [ARG1: North Korea] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] [ARGM-PRP: to finalize plans for a historic summit between Trump and the North 's leader , Kim Jong Un] .
The release of the detainees came as [ARG0: Pompeo] visited North Korea on Wednesday to [V: finalize] [ARG1: plans for a historic summit between Trump and the North 's leader , Kim Jong Un] .
